DocAttribute.Name: ParabolaConstant
DocAttribute.Documentation: Parabola constant (determining the “steepness” of the parabola). The parabola constant is provided by the “minimum parabola radius”, the true radius of a parabola at its vertical axis (the zero-gradient point of the parabola). The minimum radius is twice the focal length of the parabola (the distance between the focal point and the vertex).

DocAttribute.Name: IsConvex
DocAttribute.Documentation: Orientation of the parabolic arc, convex (Boolean=”true”) means decreasing gradient along the arc at the beginning such as at the crest of a hill, concave (Boolean=”false”) means increasing gradient along the arc at the beginning such as at the base of a valley.
